variants.primary: cursor-pointer bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold shadow-lg transform hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-200
variants.secondary: cursor-pointer bg-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 px-4 py-2 rounded-md border border-gray-300 transition-colors duration-200
variants.danger: cursor-pointer bg-red-50 hover:bg-red-100 text-red-600 px-4 py-2 rounded-md border border-red-200 transition-colors duration-200
variants.success: cursor-pointer bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold shadow-lg transform hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-200
variants.outline: cursor-pointer bg-transparent hover:bg-gray-50 text-gray-700 px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-semibold border-2 border-gray-300 hover:border-gray-400 transition-all duration-200

inputs.base: p-4 border rounded-lg transition-colors duration-200 outline-none

cards.base: bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md border border-gray-200 p-6

variants.interactive: hover:border-gray-300 cursor-pointer transform hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-200
variants.compact: bg-white rounded-md shadow-sm border border-gray-200 p-4

variants.default: px-3 py-1 bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 rounded-full text-sm font-medium
variants.muted: px-3 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 rounded-full text-sm font-medium
variants.success: px-3 py-1 bg-green-100 text-green-800 rounded-full text-sm font-medium
variants.warning: px-3 py-1 bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 rounded-full text-sm font-medium
variants.error: px-3 py-1 bg-red-100 text-red-800 rounded-full text-sm font-medium
variants.removable: px-3 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 rounded-full text-sm font-medium hover:bg-gray-200 transition-colors duration-200 cursor-pointer

patterns.section: space-y-6 pb-8 border-b border-gray-200 last:border-b-0 last:pb-0

items.default: px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-gray-900 transition-colors duration-200
items.active: px-3 py-2 rounded-md bg-blue-100 text-blue-900 font-medium

alerts.success: p-4 bg-green-50 border border-green-200 rounded-lg text-green-800
alerts.error: p-4 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg text-red-800
alerts.warning: p-4 bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 rounded-lg text-yellow-800
alerts.info: p-4 bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200 rounded-lg text-blue-800

modals.backdrop: fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center z-50
modals.content: bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl max-w-lg w-full mx-4 p-6
modals.header: flex items-center justify-between pb-4 border-b border-gray-200
modals.footer: flex justify-end gap-4 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200

loading.spinner: animate-spin h-5 w-5 border-2 border-gray-300 border-t-blue-600 rounded-full
loading.overlay: absolute inset-0 bg-white bg-opacity-75 flex items-center justify-center

components.toolbar: flex items-center justify-between p-4 border-b border-gray-200 bg-white

app-specific.clip-card: bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md border border-gray-200 p-6 space-y-4 hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-200
app-specific.clip-card-compact: bg-white rounded-md shadow-sm border border-gray-200 p-4 space-y-2
app-specific.auth-form: border border-gray-300 rounded-lg shadow-md p-6 w-full max-w-md mx-auto space-y-6
app-specific.page-header: mb-8 p-4 bg-white shadow-md sticky top-0 z-40
app-specific.search-bar: flex items-center gap-2 p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg bg-white
